name: Single filer - Low income
description: Single person earning €30,000 annually in Saxony - below median income

sources.description: Calculated from 2026 official parameters: Grundfreibetrag €12,348, Beitragsbemessungsgrenze RV/AV €101,400, KV/PV €69,750
sources.notes: Tax Class I, Saxony, no church tax, statutory insurance, 2.9% health surcharge
